timeline.message:
Fixes https://github.com/eclipse/openj9/issues/8020

`heapReconfigured` API changes resulting from

Signed-off-by: Salman Rana <salman.rana@ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: Don't pass it here, since they don't use it. Hence don't touch the delegate classes.
timeline.author: amicic
